com.mygdx.game.view.entities

Class GameView

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.ScreenAdapter
      • com.mygdx.game.view.entities.AppView
        • com.mygdx.game.view.entities.GameView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.Screen

    public class GameView
extends AppView
    A view representing the game screen. Draws all the other model's views and controls the camera.
